author: mass
msg: Adjusted symbols which began with an ssl prefix, to make it clearer that they
are not part of the OpenSSL library.
adjusted for other symbol name changes.

author: kfogel
msg: More work on issue #510: Start converting editor drivers.  Also,
update some docs, and make one trivial editor implement the new
(svn_delta_editor_t): Change documentation to refer to apply_text
instead of apply_textdelta.  Also, fix some omissions.
stream.  Add const qualifier to editor param.
(apply_text): Allow for null handler, and for null target.
Constify editor param to match prototype.
(send_file_contents): Convert to new apply_text interface.  Also,
(delta_files): Convert to the new apply_text interface, and invoke
it directly, instead of through send_text_delta.
(add_or_open_file): Update comment to talk about apply_text.
(svn_repos_dir_delta): Update comment to talk about apply_text.
Mark all other drivers as needing conversion, to save time finding
them later.  The string to tags-search for is:
Finally, convert one debugging editor to the new interface:
